## Readable interface

This interface augments the base [SubscribableStore](./ngx-tansu.subscribablestore.md) interface with the Angular-specific `OnDestroy` callback. The [Readable](./ngx-tansu.readable.md) stores can be registered in the Angular DI container and will automatically discard all the subscription when a given store is destroyed.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface Readable<T> extends SubscribableStore<T>, OnDestroy 
```
<b>Extends:</b> [SubscribableStore](./ngx-tansu.subscribablestore.md)<!-- -->&lt;T&gt;, OnDestroy
